Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [to camera crew] Can you guys come with me for a minute?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I know you saw me with the Senator. I think I'm in love, possibly for the first time. So yes, Senator Lipton and I are having an affair. I hope that I can count on your sensitivity, maturity and discretion. [turns to see Kevin has overheard him]...Why?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Alright, good. Yeah. Just sell it and get the best price you can, okay?

Quote.Speaker: White
Quote.Text: Or we can hope for a holiday rally?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: White, I'm not a day trader, I'm just a first responder in a disaster.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Andy's family had a total meltdown. His dad blew through all their money and took off to Argentina with a younger woman.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: And his brother, Walt Jr., locked himself in the wine cellar.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: The weirdest part is Andy. The aftermath got dumped on him and the way he's been handling it is just..so..

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Competent.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Right?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Are the 'Nard's hurting? Yeah, you bet. Got kicked pretty hard. Family shattered, super sad. But, I'm kinda crushing it in the damage control department. So, that's cool. I wish my dad could see me now. Of course he caused this whole mess, so, [bleep] him.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Kevin, listen to me. I'm in love with the Senator. And I need time to sort this out in a responsible matter so I need your help in keeping it a secret because this means the world to me. Ok?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: That's beautiful. No, I totally get that.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Can you do this, Kevin?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I really want to. Whatever happens, always remember that.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I don't know what that means. Hey, hey-

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [On phone] Oh, great! Yeah, um, I'll get right back to you. [hangs up] Hey guys! Anyone ever heard of Iris Black on the radio?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Yeah, she hosts the Dr. Laura Show.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Nope, that's Dr. Laura. Well, her show Biz Whiz wants someone from Dunder Mifflin to come on the air today. Does anybody feel particularly passionate about local business issues? [Dwight raises hand]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I do! I do. I do. I do. I do.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: The media can make you famous. And do you have any idea how easy it is to sell something when you're famous? [Pretends to be on phone] "Uh, yeah wow. 10 reams of 40 pound bond at only $690 after discount? Um, whatever you say, Brad Pitt." It's that easy.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Hey, so that good looking single brother of yours? Heard he's on a downward spiral with booze.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah. He's in rehab actually.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Which place? The one right near Philly? I could be there in an hour.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No, it's in New Mexico.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Oh...So..- how are you holding up?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: We're done Meredith.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [wagging tongue for voice exercises] blah blah blah, rat tat tat tittle tattled and prattled on about the little metal bottle, she spat a bit of spittle...[Group protests]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: ...In a bitter battle..Hey, hey! Stop questioning my methods, OK? I was chosen for this task for a very good reason.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, you chose yourself.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [walking away] Tricky siskel spat a bit of wicked biscuit....

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Alright, guys. A lot of assets here that my dad couldn't steal. Now, first of all, there is the family boat. 43 foot Tartan Sloop. My lawyer has lined up a buyer in the Bahamas, the sale would cover the cost of a condo and living expenses for my mom.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Sounds great.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Perfect.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Totally, except it is a no go. This boat was the heart and soul of the family. So...what else we got? Non-boat ideas. [Oscar looks outside conference room at Kevin and Angela at the copier]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: What happened?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Jammed. This day couldn't get worse. [Kevin laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yeah, I think this day could get worse.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: What does that mean?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Kevin!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [to Angela] I don't know what you're talking about. [Thumbs up Oscar]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: She could get like sixty packages of Ramen noodles for five bucks. She could eat for a month.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Alright, what's the grand total? Did we make our nut?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: If we sell everything but the boat, your mom should be set for about six months.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Guys, you don't understand, this boat's been in our family since before I was born.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Don't you guys have that place where you used to spend your summers and have all those memories?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I worked at a Jiffy Lube.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: See? I bet you wouldn't sell that Jiffy Lube for all the money in the world. Would you Darryl?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I would if I owned it and I went broke.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Alright, uh...alright. I'm gonna tell the lawyer to pull the trigger on the boat.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yes the boat means everything to my family, but we need the money. Got the memories, don't need the boat. Can't cry about it. What are you gonna do? Cry about it? [chokes up] Excuse me.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [On phone] Oh, OK. No problem. Thanks. Hey guys, WPTU called. The interview's off. They're opening a new cupcake store at the Steamtown Mall and Iris wants to cover that, so...

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Well why don't I go and tell Dwight so he can stop being such a complete nipple.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: He's gonna be disappointed.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yes. He is. And you know what? We cannot let that happen.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Fax?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh yeah, just. Watermelon teeth. This isn't how I would cheer up just anyone. But, it's a girlfriend's job to know her man and I know Andy. [laughs] He's seriously juvenile.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Cool. He's like 40 though, right?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh no, he couldn't be more than late thirty's. Tops.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Awesome. Have fun.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Vroom! Dunder Mifflin. Dunder Mifflin. Good. Sounds- [phone rings in break room, Dwight picks up] This is Dwight Shrute.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [on other end in conference room] Please hold for Ms. Black.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: [Darryl plays radio show music on keyboard] And welcome back to Biz Whiz. I'm Iris Black. On the line we have Dunder Mifflin's senior sales associate Dwight Shrute.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Iris, thank you so much for having me.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [muffled by watermelon teeth] Hey! My teeth are all this stuff in my mouth. [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Uh, did you need something?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh, I just need your signature on this.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ok. [signs paper] thanks.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Kevin, we're out of 11-38 forms. Did you order more?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I... did not.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I don't know why I'm surprised. Literally nothing you do could surprise me anymore.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [laughing in Oscar's direction] Oh really, Angela? That's interesting. Cause I do think that I could surprise you. I think that I could surprise you..oh! [Oscar makes sound trying to get him to shut up] I have to go to the bathroom!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: That doesn't surprise me.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: That actually wasn't the worst cover. I'd say at least once a week, Kevin runs out of the room shouting that he has to go to the bathroom.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [In staff meeting] See these forms...

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I have to go to the bathroom! [runs out]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [running from elevator] I have to go to the bathroom!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [Drives away waving, then screeches to a stop and runs from car]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ok, who wants to go for a super fun lunch with a super fun girlfriend?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Look, it's not that I don't want-

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ok, come on. I got someone to cover the phones, I heard on the radio about a new cupcake place we could go for dessert...perfect.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: All I ever wanted to do was sail the damn thing. But dad wouldn't let me. Said "You can't be a skipper until you're a man." You know, I'd reach for the wheel and he'd smack my hand away. Well guess what? Now I'm the man of the family and... we're selling the damn thing. So I'm never gonna have the chance.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Well, when does the boat leave, exactly?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Tonight.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Then screw lunch. Let's go for a sunset sail.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah right. It's in Stamford, Connecticut. We have to leave like right now.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ok, well then let's leave like right now.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, ok.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Yeah! OK! Let's go.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Seriously?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Of course, seriously. Get your coat on.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Alright.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Alright.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Let's do it.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Let's do it!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [On speakerphone] Iris, let me tell you. David Wallace is the CEO, but he's not hands on.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: [As Iris] So the day-to-day operations are entirely under your command?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Entirely is the perfect way to describe it, Iris.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Uh, excuse me. [reading card held up by Jim] I'm being told by my sound engineer, Steve that uh there is a clinking sound coming from your end. Does your shirt have buttons?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yes..?

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: [Jim mimes taking shirt off] I'm so sorry we're going to have to ask you to remove the shirt all together.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [Takes shirt off] Now then, we were saying. When my workers-gather-

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Oh, I'm so sorry. I am told we are still having problems Mr. Shrute. [Jim holds up card that says "Now Pants"] Your voice, it's sounding a little feminine.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That's impossible.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Are you by any chance wearing pants with a metallic zipper?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: The Senator is exhausted. This campaign is wearing him out.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: That's a tough one.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: That man he's up against is so dirty. And the senator's just pushing back as hard as he can.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Please, stop.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Please, stop.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Anyways, last night he was tired and just wanted a little Mexican brought in. [Kevin laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [Getting up to leave] I can't, it's too much! [laughing]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I'm in big trouble.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yeah, Oscar's in big trouble.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [pantless] OK, how is my voice now?

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: I'm getting the all clear from Steve, so Mr. Shrute, what is your response to the consumer product safety commission that says Dunder Mifflin paper is toxic?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [holding hand over phone] This is gotcha journalism. You know what? They're not gonna gotch me.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [looking at folder he brought Toby]It's clearly not an accounting mistake.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: So...

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Kevin. His gambling problem must've resurfaced. I'm gonna have to send him home until I can do an investigation.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Well, you've gotta do what you've gotta do.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: This is slander, Ms. Black. Slander I say! [Pam tells Jim to leave the conference room] I dare you to produce one credible source about this.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Well, as it happens we have with us the foreman of your upstate New York paper mill, Sandra Mc...Sandra Mick [points to Pam]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [changing voice] Good afternoon Iris, it's a pleasure.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Let's get straight to the point. Is your paper toxic?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No the paper's not toxic.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Thank you Sandra!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Unless it's exposed to oxygen. Then it becomes extremely toxic!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Do not listen to her! This employee is obviously disgruntled! [Jim runs panicked into break room]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: What the heck is going on?! The stock prices are plummeting! Are you gonna take control of the message or do I have to send in someone who understands the media?!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Get out of here moron! [Jim leaves]

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Excuse me, Mr. Dwight, who are you talking to?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: uhhhh....no one.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Did you just call Ms. Mick a moron?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, everything's fine.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Are you insulting my guests?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [chokes up]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [on phone] Yeah, I will be right there. Hey Oscar, what if I'm getting a promotion?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I hope that's it, Kevin.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Me too. Cause then, I would get my own office. And I wouldn't screw up your secret with Angela. I've been really worried about that.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Hi, Kevin. Look, I need to talk to you about-

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Guys? Excuse me. Um, a quick word, please just..

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Oscar, we're in the middle of talking.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Oh, you're right I'm so sorry. Snack machine on me. [gives Kevin money]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Oh that is nice. Classy move. [leaves]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [yelling in break room] That's what I'm saying! No of course not!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: What are you doing?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Those figures I gave you? They're false.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: How?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I was mad at Kevin, we had a fight and I acted vindictively.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: So you set him up.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Yes, he's innocent.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I knew it. I knew it from the beginning it was possible.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: What are you talking about? I just did this now.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: A few years ago, when I was on the jury of the Scranton Strangler..

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Sure.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: I always thought he might have been set up but I felt pressured to convict.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: That's gotta be tough.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Tough? I put an innocent man on death row.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: The fallout from this morning's revelation continues to mount, since Mr. Dwight Shrute began speaking, Dunder Mifflin share prices fell 73%. Mr. Shrute, shareholders demand accountability from corporate leadership. Can we announce your resignation at this time?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: My resignation? What are you talking about? No! I was just following orders! Listen, the person responsible for this catastrophe is the CEO and chairman, David Wallace!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: That's yours?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: That's the family boat!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh my gosh, Andy! This is enormous!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Right?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I thought it was gonna be tiny. Oh my gosh it's beautiful. So this is how your family came to America.

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: Move.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Sorry?

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: Trying to rig a boat here. I don't know how to do that when you're standing in the way.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Sure, I um..I didn't know.

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: I'm not a ghost, so I can't walk through people.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ok.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Gee, he was salty.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Geez, a little bit. [to boat] How you doing old buddy? Missed you.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: What does that one do?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: It raises the main sail. That was my job when we went sailing.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I wish I had seen you do it.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [Begins raising sail] Up she goes!

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: Don't do that. Don't do that.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh, it's OK. My girlfriend and I were actually gonna take her for a little spin and a picnic before you guys head out tonight. You know what? Get some dinner on me.

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: Nope. Can't do that.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You got it. You know what then, we'll just take it for a quick little spin around the harbor. [begins raising sail, boat guy slaps his hand]

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: We've already started boarding. And no one is insured to rig her up right now except us.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You know what? Chill, ok? I own the boat. Not gonna sue myself. Alright, so just- [Raises sail, guys slaps hand again] wow.

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: I can smack you all day if you keep touching what you're not supposed to touch.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ok, fine.

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: OK.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, fine.

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: Good stuff.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Good stuff. Nice stuff. [begins raising sail again when guy leaves, but he comes back and smacks Andy's hand again] [bleep] Damn it! Screw you dad! ..ah.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Well, we're doing it. We're finally having a picnic on the boat.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I've had a thousand picnics on this boat. The point was for me to sail it.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Andy, you never had to sail the boat to be a man.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Fine. But I could have.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: As long as we're on this boat, as far as I'm concerned, you're the captain.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I am the captain.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Right?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I'm the captain. [to boat guy] Hey, charm school.

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I'm taking it over from here.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Nice!

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: I hate to uh, ruin this moment...or breakdown, but you already signed the papers. So, if you want your boat back, you can pick it up there in the Bahamas in 10 days.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, I know cause I'm sailing it there.

Quote.Speaker: Boat Guy
Quote.Text: OK, no. I already said, you're not getting back your deposit.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Fine. Good. Keep it. Just leave the supplies, I paid for those. But how much for that cool fisherman sweater?

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: For those just joining us, terror in Greenwich. Where police have surrounded the house of Dunder Mifflin CEO David Wallace. Wallace is said to be despondent over the company's stock plummet and is taking a mailman hostage. On the line, we have chief of Greenwich Police, Mr. Bill Jackson [points to Jim].

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [using black voice] Good afternoon! [Darryl smacks his arm]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Please sir! Spare him. Please.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh, this Wallace guy is lookin' at hard time. And we only know this because of what Dwight Snoot said on record!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Ok, everyone. Everyone, hold on! I've got a solution. I know Wallace's phone number, everyone hold, I'll conference him in.

Quote.Speaker: Nellie
Quote.Text: Oh, Mr. Shrute, there's really no need to, um involve Mr... Wallace.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Do you even know what you're doing?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah. Yeah I know how to hoist the mail sail, I know to...I, I, these buttons control boat pumps and stuff. I also know where the booze stash is. So, hello. [Opens door, Andy's brother is passed out inside] Walt?

Quote.Speaker: Walt Jr.
Quote.Text: Oh god, thank goodness you're here. I was having a little trouble with this door. Yesterday. I um, I think it was yesterday.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I thought you were in rehab.

Quote.Speaker: Walt Jr.
Quote.Text: Yeah, uh, I just, I figured I'd get that first relapse out of the way. God, what's happened to our family? Everything is so messed up! How did you even know I was in here?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I didn't. I, I just came to say goodbye to the boat. But I've decided to sail it to Bermuda.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Bahamas, Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Same thing. [To Walt] Come on. I need a crew. You should be my crew. Three weeks, open ocean, no booze. You need this. I need it, we need this. Serious bro time, come on.

Quote.Speaker: David Wallace
Quote.Text: [On phone] Hello?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: David, is that you?

Quote.Speaker: David Wallace
Quote.Text: Dwight?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, thank god. Oh, thank god. Are you ok? Is everyone ok?

Quote.Speaker: David Wallace
Quote.Text: Yeah? Are you ok?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, I'm OK. I just want you to know that I believe in you. I really do. And I believe in your ability to make the right choices. I always have, David.

Quote.Speaker: David Wallace
Quote.Text: Well, thanks Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You're welcome, sir. But David, listen to me carefully. I'm gonna need you to let the mailman go. Ok?

Quote.Speaker: David Wallace
Quote.Text: Dwight?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Walk out of the house...

Quote.Speaker: David Wallace
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: ...with your hands on top of your head, everything is going to be fine. Dunder Mifflin will be in good hands while you're away in prison.

Quote.Speaker: David Wallace
Quote.Text: Ok, Dwight, gonna ask you to not call my cell anymore. Gotta go.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [enters main office, group claps] Wait a minute, you guys? You heard?

Quote.Speaker: All
Quote.Text: Shrute! Shrute! Shrute!Shrute! Shrute! Shrute! Shrute! Shrute!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [joins in] Shrute! Shrute!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Overall, I'd say my first radio interview went pretty much the way I expected.

Quote.Text: Well Oscar, I did not get the promotion. He just wanted to update my personal information.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Well, I am sorry Kevin.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Why on earth would you think you were getting a promotion?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: You know what Angela? I- Oh my god. [Senator enters]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Honey! What are you doing here?

Quote.Text: I just had a little intuition that someone I loved needed a little bit of attention today. Oscar, you're looking very healthy. Getting lots of vigorous exercise? [touches Oscar's shoulder. Oscar jumps away quickly]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oscar? What is going on? What was that?

Quote.Speaker: Senator Liptop
Quote.Text: What was that? I'm sorry, I didn't mean any offense. I was just trying to be friendly.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: You know what? I'm sorry. I overreacted. Because I'm stressed out. Why am I stressed out? Who's not stressed out? Who's not stressed out? Who-

Quote.Text: Come on Oscar, we're not just gonna sit here and ignore the obvious. Senator Lipton has a big election next week. We all need to give him our support. [claps, group joins]

Quote.Speaker: Senator Liptop
Quote.Text: Well, thanks everybody.

Quote.Text: It is really cool! U-S-A! U-S-A!
